attributes.action: Say No to "Stop & Quiz" police powers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under this proposal the police would be able to stop anyone without suspicion and ask them what they were doing and where they were going. People who don't cooperate would face a hefty fine. This is going to far and anyone who believes this will cut crime or terrorism is living in the clouds. Say no today or wake up in 1984 tomorrow.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
